description: Australian payment processing platform for direct debits, credit cards, and recurring payments. Create payers, process payments, manage subscriptions, and handle payment sources with comprehensive webhook support.

actions.name: add_source_to_payer
actions.description: Add a payment source (bank account or credit card) to an existing payer

actions.name: add_subscription
actions.description: Create a subscription between a payer and a plan

actions.name: create_or_update_payer
actions.description: Create a new payer or update an existing one

actions.name: create_or_update_scheduled_payment
actions.description: Create a new scheduled payment or update an existing one

actions.name: create_realtime_payment
actions.description: Create a real-time payment against a credit card or bank account

actions.name: find_event
actions.description: Find an event using the Event ID

actions.name: find_payer
actions.description: Find a payer by their Payer ID

actions.name: find_subscription
actions.description: Find a subscription using the Subscription ID

triggers.name: dispute_created

triggers.name: dispute_updated
triggers.description: Triggers when a dispute is updated

triggers.name: payer_created
triggers.description: Triggers when a new payer record is created

triggers.name: payer_updated
triggers.description: Triggers when a payer record is updated

triggers.name: payment_created

triggers.name: realtime_payment
